text: 3:11 Pakhon 13:14-52; Pakhon 14:1-7; Pakhon 14:8-20eibu ot-neiba amadi eigi awaba khaangbanachingba adu nahakna khang-i. Antioch, Iconium amasung Lystra-da eingonda thokkhiba ot-neibasing adu eina khaangkhiba pumnamak adu nahakna khanglibaduni. Adubu Mapu Ibungona pumnamak adudagi eibu kanbikhi.
